pr_title: GEODE-7864: Fixed queries with missing space.

timeline.message: GEODE-7864: Fixed queries with missing space.

timeline.bodyText: It seems like these must be unused. How did these queries even work previously? If they are unused is there a missing test or should these queries just be removed?
timeline.author: pivotal-jbarrett

replies.bodyText: Nope, we need to write tests to use them. Commons will have a discussion later this week to put a task in to use these queries or come up with an alternative. Right now, we are keeping these queries.
replies.author: nabarunnag
